description: This is a test module for the authentication registration and login process in a FastAPI application. It contains functions that simulate user registration and login, checking for correct status codes and response data. The tests focus on different data providers, namely default JSON and SQLite.

methods.name: _register_and_login(email: str, full_name: str | None = None, password: str = "StrongPassw0rd!")
methods.description: Performs user registration, duplicate registration check, login, and 'me' endpoint verification for a given email and password.

methods.name: test_register_login_json_provider(monkeypatch, tmp_path)
methods.description: Test case that sets environment variables for default JSON data provider and invokes registration/login flow.

methods.name: test_register_login_sqlite_provider(monkeypatch, tmp_path)
methods.description: Test case that sets environment variables for SQLite data provider with temporary database and invokes registration/login flow.

ctags.name: _register_and_login
ctags.pattern: /^def _register_and_login(email: str, full_name: str | None = None, password: str = "StrongPassw0r/
ctags.signature: (email: str, full_name: str | None = None, password: str = "StrongPassw0rd!")
